A

Ability - Class in Framework
An Ability object which can be attached to an Npc or Player
Ability.Builder - Class in Framework
Inner class to create an Ability object
addAbility(Ability) - Method in class Framework.Npc.Builder
Adds an Ability object to an Npc
addAbility(Ability) - Method in class Framework.Weapon.Builder
Adds an Ability object to a Weapon
addAttribute(String, int) - Method in class Framework.Npc.Builder
Adds an attribute variable to an Npc
addAttribute(String, int) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds an attribute variable to a Player
addCooldown(int) - Method in class Framework.Ability.Builder
Adds a cooldown variable to an Ability
addDamage(int) - Method in class Framework.Ability.Builder
Adds a damage variable to an Ability
addFollowPlayer(Player) - Method in class Framework.NpcMovement.Builder
Adds the followPlayer command to an NpcMovement
addImage() - Method in class Framework.Npc.Builder
Adds an Ability object to an Npc
Sets the Ability variable

Example usage:
Npc npc = new Npc.Builder(String name).addAbility(Ability ability).build();
addInput(String, String, String, String) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds specific input buttons to Player
addLevel(int) - Method in class Framework.Npc.Builder
Adds a level to an Npc
addLevel(int) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a level variable to a Player
addManaCost(int) - Method in class Framework.Ability.Builder
Adds a manaCost variable to an Ability
addMovement(NpcMovement) - Method in class Framework.Npc.Builder
Adds a movement pattern to an Npc
addMovementSpeed(int) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a specific movementSpeed to a Player Has a default value of 5 if not set
addMovementSpeedMultiplier(double) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a movement speed multiplier to a Player Used to add either walking or running
addNpc(Npc, int, int) - Method in class Framework.Game
Adds an Npc object to the game
addOption(Menu.Option) - Method in class Framework.Menu.Builder
Adds a option start position to the Menu object
addPattern(int, int, int, int) - Method in class Framework.NpcMovement.Builder
Adds a pattern to an NpcMovement
addPlayer(Player) - Method in class Framework.Game
Adds a Player object to the game
addPosition(int, int) - Method in class Framework.Menu.Builder
Adds a specific opening position to the Menu object Has a default value of 1x1 if not set
addPosition(int, int) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a specific start position to the Player object Has a default value of 100x100 if not set
addSize(int, int) - Method in class Framework.Menu.Builder
Adds a specific size to a Menu Has a default value of 100x100 if not set
addSize(int, int) - Method in class Framework.Npc.Builder
Adds a level to an Npc
addSize(int, int) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a specific size to a Player Has a default value of 50x50 if not set
addSpeed(int) - Method in class Framework.NpcMovement.Builder
Adds a speed variable to an NpcMovement
addSprite(Sprite) - Method in class Framework.Ability.Builder
Adds a Sprite to an Ability object
addSprite(Sprite) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a specific sprite to a Player Sprite is set to a square by default
addSprite(Sprite) - Method in class Framework.Weapon.Builder
Adds a specific sprite to a Weapon
addXp(int) - Method in class Framework.Player.Builder
Adds a xp variable to a Player
